snippet: Several former players who sued the N.F.L., accusing the league of hiding the dangers of concussions from them, asked the judge overseeing the case’s settlement to extend the date for opting out.
abstract: NFL Roundup; several former players who sued NFL for hiding the dangers of concussions ask judge overseeing case to extend the date for opting out of the settlement; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Several former players who sued the N.F.L., accusing the league of hiding the dangers of concussions from them, asked the judge overseeing the case’s settlement to extend the date for opting out.

headline.main: Former N.F.L. Players Seek Extension on Opting Out of Concussion Settlement
headline.print_headline: Former Players Seek Extension on Opting Out of Settlement
